name: Printable A4 dot grids for UI and wireframe sketching
description:
Sometimes you need pen and paper to unlock incredible UI ideas before jumping into Figma or Sketch. I built a few sketch sheet templates to speed up your creative process.


I added 4 point grids to all of these sheets so it was easier to be precise. Use it for pixel perfect UI sketching, or simply to straighten your lines.


This package comes with four A4 sized printable sheets:

  1. Full page 4pt grid
  2. Web browser with 4pt grid
  3. 4 web browsers with 4pt grids
  4. iPhone mockup with 4pt grid


Download PDF versions
